text: Takhana tamra ka'omera kaphera pradhanara balala amara to apanake amadera mata ekajana manusa byatita ara kichu mane kari na; ara amadera madhye yara itara o sthula-bud'dhisampanna tara byatita ka'uke to apanara anugatya karate dekhi na ebam amadera upara apanadera kena pradhan'ya dekhi na, baram apanara saba'i mithyabadi bale amara mane kari.
